commentBody:
Or more like, go out and get the players who take PEDs on an ongoing basis: Alex Rodriguez, Roger Clemens, Andy Pettitte and on an on.

So many cheaters and yet where's the excoriation from Mr. Rhoden and the Times?

These are proven cheaters, scientifically proven cheaters and yet not a peep.

And yet Tom Brady gets crucified for "allegedly" having known about deflated footballs without any evidence?

replies.commentBody: Proven cheaters? Like Manny Ramirez? Clemens pitched for the Sox too for a few years unless I remember incorrectly. And wasn't David Ortiz implicated? How about drinking liquor during the World Series runs? Hey, I don't care what the Sox do. Just don't get all holier than thou. And what does Brady have to do with it?
